tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255),
  event_date DATE,
  venue_id INT,
  attendance INT,
  venue_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE,
    venue_id INT,
    attendance_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE event_venue (
  event_id INT,
  venue_id INT,
  event_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES event_attendance(event_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES venue_capacity(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE past_attendance_patterns (
  event_id INT,
  venue_id INT,
  attendance_count INT,
  peak_time TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES event_attendance(event_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES venue_capacity(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    venue_id INT,
    attendance_count INT
);
